**AI Assistant:**
The Verus community is absolutely fantastic, and there are many ways to engage with them and learn more about Verus mining.

One way to start is by joining the Verus Discord channel. This is where you can connect with other community members, ask questions, and learn from their experiences. For example, the Discord channel has a #mining channel where community members share their mining rigs and experiences. You can see some amazing examples of community members' mining rigs, such as mobile mining rigs, which showcase the creativity and innovation of the Verus community.

Another way to stay updated on Verus mining is to listen to technical updates from the Verus team, such as the public technical updates from Mike Toutonghi. These updates provide valuable insights into the technology behind Verus and its development roadmap.

If you're interested in learning more about Verus mining, you can also read articles and guides on the Verus website, which provide detailed information on how to mine Verus and the benefits of doing so.

Finally, you can stay up-to-date with the latest news and developments in the Verus community by subscribing to the monthly recap, which delivers the latest news and updates directly to your mailbox.

Overall, the Verus community is a vibrant and engaged community that offers many ways to learn more about Verus mining and stay updated on the latest developments. Do you have any specific questions about getting started with Verus mining or engaging with the community?
